beer.beer_description: Meantime Pilsner, like all the world’s great lagers, is the product of long cold fermentation and maturation and gets all the time it needs for the flavour to develop and ripen. The use of selected Pilsner malt gives it a pale straw colour, and the authentic German hops contribute complex pine and spice flavours and a crisp, elegant bitterness.

Meantime Pilsner, like all the world’s great lagers, is the product of long cold fermentation and maturation and gets all the time it needs for the flavour to develop and ripen. The use of selected Pilsner malt gives it a pale straw colour, and the authentic German hops contribute complex pine and spice flavours and a crisp, elegant bitterness.

items.badge_description: Nice job exploring the world of beer. You've sampled over 100 different brews!

beer.beer_description: Meantime Pilsner, like all the world’s great lagers, is the product of long cold fermentation and maturation and gets all the time it needs for the flavour to develop and ripen. The use of selected Pilsner malt gives it a pale straw colour, and the authentic German hops contribute complex pine and spice flavours and a crisp, elegant bitterness.

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 25 check-ins at venue that is verified. Try 5 more for Level 6!
99 bottles of beer on the wall, 99 bottles of beer. Take one down, pass it around.... That's 45 checkins with the serving style of Bottle. Try 5 more for Level 10!
Light and crisp, a Pilsner is all you need to make your day great. Though, perhaps another one would make it even better. That’s 45 different Pilsners. Try 5 more for Level 10!

beer.beer_description: Meantime Pilsner, like all the world’s great lagers, is the product of long cold fermentation and maturation and gets all the time it needs for the flavour to develop and ripen. The use of selected Pilsner malt gives it a pale straw colour, and the authentic German hops contribute complex pine and spice flavours and a crisp, elegant bitterness.

Meantime Pilsner, like all the world’s great lagers, is the product of long cold fermentation and maturation and gets all the time it needs for the flavour to develop and ripen. The use of selected Pilsner malt gives it a pale straw colour, and the authentic German hops contribute complex pine and spice flavours and a crisp, elegant bitterness.

items.badge_description: While a pint of traditional English ale will always remain a staple, the craft beer scene in England, much like the rest of the world, has continued to grow at a rapid rate! That's 15 different beers from a brewery from England! Try 5 more for Level 4!

beer.beer_description: Meantime Pilsner, like all the world’s great lagers, is the product of long cold fermentation and maturation and gets all the time it needs for the flavour to develop and ripen. The use of selected Pilsner malt gives it a pale straw colour, and the authentic German hops contribute complex pine and spice flavours and a crisp, elegant bitterness.

items.badge_description: Are you having a rough morning or perhaps just can’t wait for happy hour. Why not grab a quick pint with lunch and coast through the afternoon.

beer.beer_description: Meantime Pilsner, like all the world’s great lagers, is the product of long cold fermentation and maturation and gets all the time it needs for the flavour to develop and ripen. The use of selected Pilsner malt gives it a pale straw colour, and the authentic German hops contribute complex pine and spice flavours and a crisp, elegant bitterness.

items.badge_description: There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 305 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 62!

beer.beer_description: Meantime Pilsner, like all the world’s great lagers, is the product of long cold fermentation and maturation and gets all the time it needs for the flavour to develop and ripen. The use of selected Pilsner malt gives it a pale straw colour, and the authentic German hops contribute complex pine and spice flavours and a crisp, elegant bitterness.

items.badge_description: Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 375 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower.
Had enough tea and biscuits? Head to the pub for a pint! That's at least 35 beers from the UK. Try 5 more for Level 8.

user.bio: "They who drink beer will think beer."

items.badge_description: Wine isn't the only beverage worthy of pairing with a delicious meal. With so many styles widely available, there’s a perfect pint for any cuisine of your choosing. That's a beer at 40 different venues categorized as a Restaurant. Try 5 more for Level 9!

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 140 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 29!

While a pint of traditional English ale will always remain a staple, the craft beer scene in England, much like the rest of the world, has continued to grow at a rapid rate! That's 20 different beers from a brewery from England! Try 5 more for Level 5!

A big juicy burger, some golden brown french fries, and a pint of your favorite brewskie. What more could you want? That's a beer at 5 different venus with the category of Burger Joint. Try 5 more for Level 2!
